name: Woe Siphon
movement: walks at a speed of 30 feet
description: The Woe Siphon is characterized by its ability to sap the strength and resolve of its foes while evading direct confrontation. It has a menacing appearance and a sinister aura.
memorable: It drains the life force from its enemies and can turning invisible while attacking.
goals: To manipulate and weaken adversaries before striking from the shadows.
relations: Could be in league with other fey creatures or serve darker forces in the fey realm.
environment: Typically found in forests or enchanted locales where it can ambush its prey.
strengths: Resistant to nonmagical attacks and immune to being charmed or frightened.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma suggest poor social skills and limited mental prowess.
attacks: Uses a powerful melee attack that combines bludgeoning and psychic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Siphoning Fist, which not only damages but can reduce an opponent's maximum hit points.
senses: Has darkvision up to 120 feet, allowing it to see in the dark.
additional_information: Possesses the ability to detect sentience within a mile.
Can cause despair in opponents, giving them disadvantage on attacks and checks.
Ability to turn invisible until it attacks, increasing its evasiveness.
Drains health by siphoning the life force of others.
Uses psychological manipulation to weaken its foes.
test_queries: cunning creature that attacks weak minds
medium fey that uses psychological warfare
